data.description:
Speed One - Real Racing takes you on an unparalleled car racing adventure designed specifically for Oculus Quest 2, Pro, and 3. Step into the driver's seat and experience the thrill of high-speed car races in stunning virtual reality.


üèé Customization at Your Fingertips:
Choose from a variety of customizable cars and make them your own. Fine-tune your vehicle for optimal performance and style as you race against the clock and skilled opponents.

üåç Challenging Tracks:
Select from an array of tracks, each offering unique challenges and breathtaking scenery. Master tight corners, speed through straightaways, and outmaneuver your rivals to claim victory.

üöÄ Immersive VR Experience:
With the advanced technology of Oculus Quest, experience car racing like never before. Feel the roar of the engines, the rush of speed, and the intensity of the competition, all from the comfort of your VR headset.

üéÆ Beyond a Game - It‚Äôs a Sensation:
Speed One - Real Racing is more than just a game; it‚Äôs a fully immersive experience. Test your skills, push your limits, and become the undisputed champion of car racing. Whether you‚Äôre a casual player or a racing enthusiast, this is your chance to live the ultimate car race in virtual reality.

Ready to hit the tracks? Download Speed One - Real Racing now and begin your journey to becoming the fastest racer in VR!

changelog.change_log:
Fixed Bugs 
Add button recenter function in quest native button.
Add FFV
Add message "Wrong Direction!"

robot driver
mirrors
more speed sense

new podium system with 3 buttons 
bug fixes

* New Ranking System
* Fixed some bugs
* Better drive sensation

Fixed some bugs in performace
Add cellphone to see position inside car.
Add ranking per track
Add achievements

Fixed bug when the car rolls over, it returns to the original position.
Improved high-speed cornering system, now the steering wheel turns more.
improved audio system and audiences on maps

fixed bugs
2 new cars
2 new tracks

+ Fixed engine sound
+ Fixed curves 
+ Changed level musics
+ Fixed minor bugs
